_comments.multiple_rules_check_by_condition: Use 'AND' to run the test only if all conditions are met. Use 'OR' to run the test if any condition is met.
_comments.keep the array empty: If you want to run the test on all pages, keep the array empty.
_comments.selector: Define the CSS selector for the element you want to check.
_comments.is_matched: Set to 'true' if the element should be present, 'false' if it should not be.
_comments.waiting_time: Time in milliseconds to wait for the element to appear.
_comments.total_element_count: Number of elements that should match the selector.
